Open Assistant

Type: current

Signal

Open Assistant demonstrated a community-built, open conversational assistant with transparent training and reproducible components.

Context

Its most active implementation phase has slowed, but the project remains a reference model for participatory AI development outside closed product pipelines.

Relevance

For Openflows, this is methodologically relevant: capability, governance, and transparency can be designed together rather than treated as separate concerns.

Current State

Lower operational activity, high reference value.

Open Questions

  • Which governance patterns from this model can be reused locally?
  • What is required to sustain open assistant projects beyond launch cycles?
  • How can participatory data practices remain practical at smaller scales?
